title: Whooo! Sweet freedom!
content:
Good news everyone! Management has rejected me for the rotorua progressive placement scholarships!

What is this scholarship? Its a job/industry education placement which would mean big monies to anyone selected, and the oppourtunity to get an importan job [if fast food yeah, but hey, I'm making a living, don't diss it]

There is one teeny problem about it that I only realized *after* apllying, and indeed becoming one of three finalists; is that you have to move waay waaaaay across the country to rotorua [They pay your accomodation outta your paycheck, but not furniture.]

Being only a young girl this scared the skit out of me I tell you, as it would mean staying near cousins *without internet acess* which would mean removal from my favourate community [Oh, and this bunch of twits too]

So right now I am ultra mega uber happy, feel free to steal my stuff as I'll only remove one of your limbs!

Szevvy Forever!
And Spleen never!

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.jpg[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Whooo! Sweet freedom!
content:
I'm again confused, I don't understand what's happening! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] Really! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] So, are you moving somewhere or not?3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Whooo! Sweet freedom!
content:
Because 1.) I'm too young and 2.) Tim was better qualified.

I *Don't* get to move anywhere, which is a big, big relief! Huzzah!Szevvy Forever!
And Spleen never!

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.jpg[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord
